name: openhid-backend
description: The backend of the OpenHID research lab website.
author: Alain Galvan <hi@alain.xyz>

scripts.develop: set DEBUG=express:* & set NODE_ENV=development & ts-node -F -D src/main.ts
scripts.start: set DEBUG=false & set NODE_ENV=production & ts-node -F -D src/main.ts &
